name: Brogress
description:
Mini Guide

What is Brogress? 

Brogress is a dungeon crawler where the Main Character who has just woke up in the depth of the sunny Sahara not knowing his identity or what brought him in here. He gets into a cave away from the sun, and the game starts.

He will face one of two random enemies and he will fight them to get deeper into the cave.

After winning the first encounter the Main Character will be offered one of two dice to progress the cave with 

He will encounter the second enemy and be offered another power up before facing the BOSS and gets to the other side where the trees grow.

Gameplay

When encountering an enemy you can choose to roll one of two dices you have:

The Attack Dice or The Defend Dice

The value of the dice will determine the Attack or Shield you're using.

Hints

You can see the intention of your enemy on their dice in the right side of the game.

Try to Defend when the enemy intent to attack!
